name: Spiderin' n' Gliderin'
description:
Jump. Climb. Wall run. Become one with the spider and truly find yourself.

Where is everyone? You already ate them. Maybe, I guess.

Let me know what you think, and if you have any ideas for objectives/gameplay.

Please report bugs or suggestions below or to fatalaigaming@gmail.com

Current version: 0.1, simple prototype

*Features:

-speed and FPS display

-walking, with running speed by holding shift

-double jump

-wall climbing and wall bouncing

-air strafing infinitely accelerates if timed correctly (can you get higher than 20 with all this crap around?)

*Controls:

Jump - Space

Move - WASD or arrow keys

Run - Shift

"Crouch" - C or CTRL

Look - Mouse

*Download instructions:

-download, extract folder, open Spiderin n Gliderin.exe

-accept settings. When done playing, press alt + F4 to exit game.

-no win or fail conditions, though you fall through the map it's your own fault ;)  (Will fix later, Alt + F4 for now!.. heh)

My goals:

-building on active prototype by improving and adding upon existing features 

-working with community feedback

-having fun!
